name: Pong Together
description:
If you like ping pong or just pong, you'll also like this amazing ping pong game. Play ping pong against the computer on a simple match or in a tournament where you and your friends are trying to become the next champion.

Interact with the other opponents through the mini-chat and tell them what is in your mind.

Earn the most points possible in ten(10) tournament matches and claim the champion's reward that increases with the number of players in the tournament.

*Play Methods*

Move the mouse up and down to move the ping-pong racket and play. Use the "Boost" skill to increase the speed of the ball.
